# Mastery of Word and Thought (Level 20 Enchanter)
## Overview
*This massive tome is the size of four normal spellbooks, bound in leather as hard as plate armor and stitched together with strands of thin, pliable metal rather than thread. Toward the end is a list of names, each crossed out.*

**Protection** *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|Symbol of death]]* on the first page of the book (Fort DC 22)

**Opposition Schools** Conjuration, illusion

**Value** 22,750 gp (27,250 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

9th—*[[Dominate Monster (Spell)|dominate monster]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Foresight (Spell)|foresight]]*, *[[Mage's Disjunction (Spell)|mage’s disjunction]]*, *[[Hold Monster, Mass (Spell)|mass hold monster]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Suffocation, Mass (Spell)|mass suffocation]]*, *[[Power Word Kill (Spell)|power word kill]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Time Stop (Spell)|time stop]]*

8th—*[[Binding (Spell)|binding]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Clone (Spell)|clone]]*, *[[Irresistible Dance (Spell)|irresistible dance]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Mind Blank (Spell)|mind blank]]*, *[[Polymorph Any Object (Spell)|polymorph any object]]*, *[[Power Word Stun (Spell)|power word stun]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Sunburst (Spell)|sunburst]]*

7th—*[[Deflection|deflection]]*, *[[Arcane Sight, Greater (Spell)|greater arcane sight]]*, *[[Instant Summons (Spell)|instant summons]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]]*, *[[Hold Person, Mass (Spell)|mass hold person]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Plane Shift (Spell)|plane shift]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Power Word Blind (Spell)|power word blind]]* <sup>S</sup>, *resonating word*, *[[Symbol of Stunning (Spell)|symbol of stunning]]* <sup>S</sup>

6th—*[[Cloak of Dreams (Spell)|cloak of dreams]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Contingency (Spell)|contingency]]*, *[[Enemy Hammer (Spell)|enemy hammer]]*, *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]*, [[Geas_Quest (Spell)|geas/quest]] <sup>S</sup>, *[[Legend Lore (Spell)|legend lore]]*, *[[Mage's Lucubration (Spell)|mage’s lucubration]]*, *[[Thunderclap (Spell)|thunderclap]]*, *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*

5th—*[[Dismissal (Spell)|dismissal]]*, *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Fabricate (Spell)|fabricate]]*, *icy prison*, *[[Feeblemind (Spell)|feeblemind]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Mage's Private Sanctum (Spell)|mage’s private sanctum]]*, *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]*, *[[Prying Eyes (Spell)|prying eyes]]*, *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* <sup>OP</sup>

4th—*[[Bestow Curse (Spell)|bestow curse]]**,* *[[Crushing Despair (Spell)|crushing despair]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|dimensional anchor]]*, *[[Fear (Spell)|fear]]**, [[Moonstruck (Spell)|moonstruck]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Resilient Sphere (Spell)|resilient sphere]]*, *[[Stone Shape (Spell)|stone shape]]*, *[[Stoneskin (Spell)|stoneskin]]*

3rd—*[[Fireball (Spell)|fireball]]*, *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]*, *[[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|greater magic weapon]]*, *[[Heroism (Spell)|heroism]]* <sup>S</sup>, *loathsome veil*, *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]*, *[[Protection From Energy (Spell)|protection from energy]]*, *symbol of peace* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]* <sup>S</sup>

2nd—*[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]*, *[[Continual Flame (Spell)|continual flame]]*, *[[False Life (Spell)|false life]]*, *[[Hideous Laughter (Spell)|hideous laughter]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Magic Mouth (Spell)|magic mouth]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]*, *[[Rope Trick (Spell)|rope trick]]*, *[[See Invisibility (Spell)|see invisibility]]*, *[[Touch of Idiocy (Spell)|touch of idiocy]]* <sup>S</sup>

1st—*[[Alarm (Spell)|alarm]]*, *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*, *hush*, *[[Hydraulic Push (Spell)|hydraulic push]]*, *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]*, *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]*, *[[Memory Lapse (Spell)|memory lapse]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Ray of Enfeeblement (Spell)|ray of enfeeblement]]*, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]*, *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]* <sup>OP</sup>

0—standard plus *breeze*, *[[Spark (Spell)|spark]]*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Curse of Names (Su)** When you are finished preparing your spells with this book, write the proper name of a single creature among the list of names in this book. As a swift action, when you are within 30 feet of the named creature, you can call out its name to bestow the curse of names on it. This spends the boon’s effect. The target creature takes a –2 penalty on all attack rolls, and a –4 penalty on all attack rolls against you, for 1 minute. When you activate this curse, the name is crossed out in the back of the book. That creature cannot be the target of a curse of names originating from you ever again. The penalties of two instances of curse of names on the same creature do not stack.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 125
